Build a simulated panel

Source: R/simulate_panel.R
simulate_panel.Rd

Build a simulated panel

Usage

simulate_panel(n_units = 30, n_periods = 30)

Arguments

n_units

An integer specifying the number of observational units

n_periods

An integer specifying the number of periods (assumed to be days, max 30)

Value

a data.frame containing a panel with three columns for id, time, and treatment

Examples

library(EventHorizon)
# Load a panel
panel <- simulate_panel(n_units = 10, n_periods = 10)
head(panel)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>   id    time       treatment
#>   <chr> <date>         <int>
#> 1 A1    2025-01-01         0
#> 2 A1    2025-01-02         0
#> 3 A1    2025-01-03         0
#> 4 A1    2025-01-04         1
#> 5 A1    2025-01-05         0
#> 6 A1    2025-01-06         0
